Plot: A grieving father in a downward spiral stumbles across a box of his recently deceased son's demo tapes and lyrics. Shocked by the discovery of this unknown talent, he forms a band in the hope of finding some catharsis.
Title: Rudderless
Writer: Casey Twenter, Jeff Robison, William H. Macy
Actors: Miles Heizer, Alexandra Lovelace, Billy Crudup, Casey Twenter
tomatoConsensus: Rudderless asks its cast to carry an awful lot of weight for its occasionally manipulative story; fortunately, this talented bunch -- led by Billy Crudup -- is often more than up to the task.
